subject: Suits and Litigation
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: A former Knicks intern who had sex with Stephon Marbury in his truck outside a strip club in 2005 testified in federal court on Monday that she had not been drunk or coerced.
snippet: A former Knicks intern who had sex with Stephon Marbury in his truck outside a strip club in 2005 testified in federal court on Monday that she had not been drunk or coerced.
